languages.text: "Досточтимый господин Антар приступил к борьбе за чистоту палуб с похвальным рвением, но некоторые его привычки... приводят обслугу в ужас. Недавно он принудил двух слуг отмывать недостаточно тщательно убранную грязь языками. Буквально — языками. Причем тому, кто сначала отказался, пришлось держать вырванный язык в кулаке".

"The esteemed Master Anthar has thrown himself into the struggle for deck sanitation with commendable zeal, but some of his methods are... terrifying the staff. He recently ordered two servants to use their tongues to lick at a spot that was unsatisfactorily cleaned. Literally, their tongues. And the servant who initially refused was given his excised tongue to use as a cleaning implement."
languages.original_text: "Досточтимый господин Антар приступил к борьбе за чистоту палуб с похвальным рвением, но некоторые его привычки... приводят обслугу в ужас. Недавно он принудил двух слуг отмывать недостаточно тщательно убранную грязь языками. Буквально — языками. Причем тому, кто сначала отказался, пришлось держать вырванный язык в кулаке".

He recently ordered two servants to use their tongues to lick at a spot that was unsatisfactorily cleaned. Literally, their tongues. And the servant who initially refused was given his excised tongue to use as a cleaning implement."

He recently ordered two servants to use their tongues to lick at a spot that was unsatisfactorily cleaned. Literally, their tongues. And the servant who initially refused was given his excised tongue to use as a cleaning implement."

languages.text: "Der geschätzte Meister Anthar hat sich mit lobenswertem Eifer für die Sauberkeit des Decks eingesetzt, aber einige seiner Methoden ... verschrecken das Personal. Kürzlich hat er zwei Dienern befohlen, einen unzureichend entfernten Fleck mit ihren Zungen zu beseitigen. MIT IHREN ZUNGEN! Und der Diener, der sich zunächst weigerte, erhielt seine abgeschnittene Zunge als Reinigungstuch."
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Master Anthar has thrown himself into the struggle for deck sanitation with commendable zeal, but some of his methods are... terrifying the staff. He recently ordered two servants to use their tongues to lick at a spot that was unsatisfactorily cleaned. Literally, their tongues. And the servant who initially refused was given his excised tongue to use as a cleaning implement."

traits.locale_text: "Der geschätzte Meister Anthar hat sich mit lobenswertem Eifer für die Sauberkeit des Decks eingesetzt, aber einige seiner Methoden ... verschrecken das Personal. Kürzlich hat er zwei Dienern befohlen, einen unzureichend entfernten Fleck mit ihren Zungen zu beseitigen. MIT IHREN ZUNGEN! Und der Diener, der sich zunächst weigerte, erhielt seine abgeschnittene Zunge als Reinigungstuch."

languages.text: « Maître Anthar se consacre à sa tâche avec un zèle des plus louables, mais le reste du personnel trouve certaines de ses méthodes... terrifiantes. Il a récemment ordonné à deux serviteurs de se servir de leur langue pour nettoyer un endroit qui n'était pas suffisamment propre. Leur langue, vous avez bien entendu. Qui plus est, celui qui a osé émettre une objection s'est ensuite vu contraint d'obtempérer en utilisant sa langue préalablement tranchée. »
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Master Anthar has thrown himself into the struggle for deck sanitation with commendable zeal, but some of his methods are... terrifying the staff. He recently ordered two servants to use their tongues to lick at a spot that was unsatisfactorily cleaned. Literally, their tongues. And the servant who initially refused was given his excised tongue to use as a cleaning implement."

traits.locale_text: « Maître Anthar se consacre à sa tâche avec un zèle des plus louables, mais le reste du personnel trouve certaines de ses méthodes... terrifiantes. Il a récemment ordonné à deux serviteurs de se servir de leur langue pour nettoyer un endroit qui n'était pas suffisamment propre. Leur langue, vous avez bien entendu. Qui plus est, celui qui a osé émettre une objection s'est ensuite vu contraint d'obtempérer en utilisant sa langue préalablement tranchée. »

languages.text: 「尊敬すべきマスター・アンサールは、デッキの衛生維持という任務に称賛に値する熱意で取り組んでおられますが、その手法のいくつかが…乗員たちを恐怖させております。最近では二人の従僕に、掃除が不十分だった箇所を舌で舐めてきれいにするよう命じたのです。文字通り、自分の舌でですよ。そして最初に拒否した使用人には、切り取った自分の舌を清掃道具として渡しました」
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Master Anthar has thrown himself into the struggle for deck sanitation with commendable zeal, but some of his methods are... terrifying the staff. He recently ordered two servants to use their tongues to lick at a spot that was unsatisfactorily cleaned. Literally, their tongues. And the servant who initially refused was given his excised tongue to use as a cleaning implement."

traits.locale_text: 「尊敬すべきマスター・アンサールは、デッキの衛生維持という任務に称賛に値する熱意で取り組んでおられますが、その手法のいくつかが…乗員たちを恐怖させております。最近では二人の従僕に、掃除が不十分だった箇所を舌で舐めてきれいにするよう命じたのです。文字通り、自分の舌でですよ。そして最初に拒否した使用人には、切り取った自分の舌を清掃道具として渡しました」

languages.text: «El estimado maestro Anthar está acometiendo la labor de limpiar las cubiertas con un celo encomiable, pero sus métodos están... aterrorizando al personal. Hace poco, ordenó a dos sirvientes que usaran sus lenguas para lamer un lugar que no estaba lo suficientemente limpio. Les hizo usarlas de verdad. Y el sirviente que se negó en primer lugar recibió su lengua amputada a modo de bayeta».
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Master Anthar has thrown himself into the struggle for deck sanitation with commendable zeal, but some of his methods are... terrifying the staff. He recently ordered two servants to use their tongues to lick at a spot that was unsatisfactorily cleaned. Literally, their tongues. And the servant who initially refused was given his excised tongue to use as a cleaning implement."

traits.locale_text: «El estimado maestro Anthar está acometiendo la labor de limpiar las cubiertas con un celo encomiable, pero sus métodos están... aterrorizando al personal. Hace poco, ordenó a dos sirvientes que usaran sus lenguas para lamer un lugar que no estaba lo suficientemente limpio. Les hizo usarlas de verdad. Y el sirviente que se negó en primer lugar recibió su lengua amputada a modo de bayeta».

languages.text: “尊敬的安萨大师以值得称道的热情，投入到了维护甲板卫生的斗争之中，但他的某些做法……实在是把船员都吓坏了。前不久，他命令两名船员用舌头把没擦干净的地方舔干净，真的就是字面上的用舌头去舔。其中一个船员不肯执行命令，结果那个人的舌头被割了下来，当成了清洁工具。”
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Master Anthar has thrown himself into the struggle for deck sanitation with commendable zeal, but some of his methods are... terrifying the staff. He recently ordered two servants to use their tongues to lick at a spot that was unsatisfactorily cleaned. Literally, their tongues. And the servant who initially refused was given his excised tongue to use as a cleaning implement."

traits.locale_text: “尊敬的安萨大师以值得称道的热情，投入到了维护甲板卫生的斗争之中，但他的某些做法……实在是把船员都吓坏了。前不久，他命令两名船员用舌头把没擦干净的地方舔干净，真的就是字面上的用舌头去舔。其中一个船员不肯执行命令，结果那个人的舌头被割了下来，当成了清洁工具。”

languages.text: "Saygıdeğer Üsteğmen Anthar, kendisini güverte temizliği görevine övgüye mazhar bir şevkle adamış olsa da bazı yöntemleri... Tabiri caizse personeli dehşete düşürüyor. Yakın zamanda iki hizmetkâra iyi temizlenmediğini teşhis ettiği bir yeri yalamalarını emretmiş. Evet, dilleriyle... Sonra emrine uymayan hizmetkârı dilini kesip eline vererek temizliğe zorlamış."
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Master Anthar has thrown himself into the struggle for deck sanitation with commendable zeal, but some of his methods are... terrifying the staff. He recently ordered two servants to use their tongues to lick at a spot that was unsatisfactorily cleaned. Literally, their tongues. And the servant who initially refused was given his excised tongue to use as a cleaning implement."

Yakın zamanda iki hizmetkâra iyi temizlenmediğini teşhis ettiği bir yeri yalamalarını emretmiş. Evet, dilleriyle... Sonra emrine uymayan hizmetkârı dilini kesip eline vererek temizliğe zorlamış."
